TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThemeDictionaryExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现允许应用程序作者根据当前系统主题自定义控件样式的标记扩展。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是一个标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. 标记扩展类的主要目的是为处理器实现的某个方面提供基础结构支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，并且通常不会从用户代码中调用由标记扩展公开的成员。Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. 此扩展插件支持中的 [ThemeDictionary 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension) 用法 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。This extension supports the [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 信息，请参阅 [ThemeDictionary 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个设置特殊命名约定的字符串，该字符串标识对特殊的主题所应用的字典。

span.span: Gets or sets a string setting a particular naming convention to identify which dictionary applies for a particular theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 信息，请参阅 [ThemeDictionary 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.

param.span: 此服务将为 提供结果。

span.span: This service is expected to provide results for .

summary.span: 返回一个应在应用了此扩展的属性上设置的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

summary.span: 对于 ，它是特殊主题字典扩展的 URI 值。

span.span: For , this is the URI value for a particular theme dictionary extension.

returns.span: 要在应用了扩展的属性上设置的对象值。

span.span: The object value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 处理器实现，不应直接调用。This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器实现使用此方法 `ThemeResourceDictionary` 在对象创建过程中正确处理扩展值。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `ThemeResourceDictionary` extension values during object creation. 此实现依赖于基于传递的的服务 `serviceProvider` 。This implementation relies on services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 不得为 `null` 。It must not be `null`. `serviceProvider`应实现该对象 。The `serviceProvider` object is expected to implement .

exception.span: 必须在构造过程中或使用 方法之前设置此值。

span.span: You must set this value during construction or before using the method.

exception.span: 为 ，或没有为 提供服务。

span.span: is or does not provide a service for .

span.span: specifies a target type that does not match .
